altername_name: LEGO Star Wars: La Saga Completa
LEGO Star Wars: Die komplette Saga
name: LEGO Star Wars: The Complete Saga
overview: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Complete Saga enables families to play through the events of all six Star Wars movies in one videogame for the first time ever. New levels, new characters, and new features add to the fun, creativity and tongue-in-cheek humor that made LEGO Star Wars: The Video Game and LEGO Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy such huge hits.
